WIPO Standards are presented as recommendations and are directed to states and international organizations, in particular to their national or regional intellectual property offices, to the International Bureau of WIPO, and to any other national or international institution interested in intellectual property documentation. All documents listed below are in PDF format. See also WIPO Standards referenced in other WIPO Standards Tracked changes files for different versions Archived WIPO Standards Standard Title Latest Update Standards of a general nature, common to information and documentation ST.2 Manner for designating calendar dates May 1997 ST.3 Two-letter codes for the representation of states, other entities and organizations October 2024 ST.13 Numbering of applications for IPRs February 2008 ST.90 Recommendation for processing and communicating Intellectual Property data using Web APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) Annex III, Appendix A Annex III, Appendix B February 2023 ST.91 Recommendations on digital three-dimensional (3D) models and 3D images October 2024 ST.92 Recommendations on the Data Package Format for the Electronic Exchange of Priority Documents October 2024 ST.96 Processing of Intellectual Property information using XML Annexes Related Resource: ST.96 XML Examples April 2025 ST.97 Recommendation for Processing of Intellectual Property Data Using JSON January 2023 Standards relating to patent information and documentation ST.1 Minimum data elements required to uniquely identify a patent document May 2001 ST.6 Numbering of published patent documen...
